title: X: Past Is Present
description: When a middle-aged filmmaker meets an alluring stranger at a party, he's haunted by troubling memories of his past relationships.
actors: Rajat Kapoor, Anshuman Jha, Radhika Apte, Huma Qureshi

title: XX
description: This four-part anthology of short horror films features stories that include some traditional themes but all are shown from a female point of view.
actors: Natalie Brown, Jonathan Watton, Melanie Lynskey, Lindsay Burdge
